Python Powered Mentorship with Ray Berg 🐍

Oct 24, 2018

  • civictech
  • episode
  • python
  • chicago
  • mentorship

This episode features Ray Berg, Software Developer at Braintree and Organizer for the Chicago Python Users Group (Chipy). Ray runs a free mentorship program through that community that allows folks to power up their skills using the Python ecosystem. We’ll learn about how to be better mentors and mentees and about how that program operates.
